text: Auth0 term is Tenant

elements.text: Auth0 term is Tenant

text: So, create a tenant for each network (devnet, testnet, mainnet)

elements.text: So, create a tenant for each network (devnet, testnet, mainnet)

text: Each OIDC app created inside your tenant would share the same audience (for access tokens at least)

elements.text: Each OIDC app created inside your tenant would share the same audience (for access tokens at least)

text:
Good afternoon!
A large number of validators using the Docker Compose setup are still experiencing issues connecting to the Utility app. As can be seen from the messages in Slack, many validators are facing the same problem.
I brought this up three weeks ago, and no one has been able to assist us so far.
Once again, I kindly ask you to assign someone to help us, our team is ready to write a guide for the rest of the validators.
We’re not asking for detailed documentation, we just need some help or even a rough draft!

I also want to point out that this issue is affecting not only validators but also applications.

elements.text:
Good afternoon!
A large number of validators using the Docker Compose setup are still experiencing issues connecting to the Utility app. As can be seen from the messages in Slack, many validators are facing the same problem.
I brought this up three weeks ago, and no one has been able to assist us so far.
Once again, I kindly ask you to assign someone to help us, our team is ready to write a guide for the rest of the validators.
We’re not asking for detailed documentation, we just need some help or even a rough draft!

I also want to point out that this issue is affecting not only validators but also applications.

text: <@U06GRUXKVHB> if you happen to be able to help?

elements.text: if you happen to be able to help?

text: <@U08N8PV7ZPC> Please have a look.

elements.text: Please have a look.

text: Anyway, don't forget the WebUI (DA Network Utility/CNS or Wallet) negociates an access token with your OIDC provider and passes it to your participant when calling its APIs, that's why you need a unique audience across all apps. Audience has to match end to end

elements.text: Anyway, don't forget the WebUI (DA Network Utility/CNS or Wallet) negociates an access token with your OIDC provider and passes it to your participant when calling its APIs, that's why you need a unique audience across all apps. Audience has to match end to end

text: When upgrading the utility to v0.7.0, do I need to re-download dars for v0.7.0 and then re-execute the upload-dar.sh script?

elements.text: When upgrading the utility to v0.7.0, do I need to re-download dars for v0.7.0 and then re-execute the upload-dar.sh script?

text: You have to upload the new DAR, yes
